section.para: The module ngx_http_index_module processes requests ending with the slash character (‘/’). Such requests can also be processed by ngx_http_autoindex_module and ngx_http_random_index_module modules.

directive.name: index
directive.para:
Defines files that will be used as an index. The file name can contain variables. Files are checked in the specified order. The last element of the list can be a file with an absolute path. Example:
index index.$geo.html index.0.html /index.html;
